lv.emes.libraries.file_system

Class MS_BinaryTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • lv.emes.libraries.file_system.MS_BinaryTools

  • public class MS_BinaryTools
extends java.lang.Object
    Module consists of methods for binary file I/O. It is mainly used to perform DB operations with binary file exchange.
    Version:
    1.3.

      • writeFile

        public static void writeFile(java.io.InputStream in,
                             java.lang.String outputFile)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Copy given in stream into file outputFile.
        Parameters:
        in - might be FileInputStream too. The stream that holds read binary file data.
        outputFile - path to file that needs to be created.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs. For example, when for some reason cannot convert in to output binary stream.

        out - Stream in which in stream will be copied
